text: Wulun tamen zai nali pi fa xian, tamen dou jiang zao xiuru, chufei you an la de mengyue he renlei de mengyue baohu. Tamen zaoshou an la de qian nu. Tamen jiang zao [an la de] huimie, zhe shi yinwei tamen bu xinyang an la de jixiang he wangtu shahai xianzhimen, zhe shi yinwei tamen beini he chaoyue fadu.
